sentences.sContent: The coeval of sushi afterwards and personage began to spread the creation form of "he tao shi".
sentences.sContent_eng: The coeval of sushi afterwards and personage began to spread the creation form of "he tao shi".
sentences.sCn: 苏轼同时代及其后的文人士子，开始对“和陶诗”这一创作形式加以推广。

sentences.sContent: The excursion will focus on Late Pleistocene loess-palaeosol sequences in the area and the differentiation of coeval lithostratigraphic units.
sentences.sContent_eng: The excursion will focus on Late Pleistocene loess-palaeosol sequences in the area and the differentiation of coeval lithostratigraphic units.
sentences.sCn: 野外考察重点考察在晚更新世黄土—古土壤序列及同时期不同岩性地层单位间的差异。

remMethod.val: co(共同) + ev(时代) + al → 同时代的

trans.tranOther: of or belonging to the same age or generation
